Model.Dice

Class YatzyDiceCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Dice>
          • Model.Dice.DiceCollection
            • Model.Dice.YatzyDiceCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Dice>, java.util.Collection<Dice>, java.util.List<Dice>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class YatzyDiceCollection
extends DiceCollection
    YatzyDiceCollection is an extension of DiceCollection that always contains 5 Dice and has additional methods specific to the game Yahtzee.
    Author:
    Isak, Marianna, Gustav
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
